modName: Vanilla naming scheme for Deployable Traps V151
summary: Changes the names of all the trap items in Deploy-able Traps to fit in with default Skyrim naming scheme.
descriptionHtml:
Changes the names of all the trap items in Deploy-able Traps to fit in with default Skyrim naming scheme.

======================================================================================

I found it annoying that all the traps in Deployable Traps had bee prefixed with [Trap] or [STrap] amd it didn\'t fit in with any of the other items in the game.

I fixed this. Now traps have vanilla-like names, and should fit in with all the other items in your inventory.

for instance, the \"[Trap] oil\" is now called \"Oil Trap\" and \"Oil Trap (Sticky)\". Makes more sense to me.
author: Zombiemold
